title: Sweet potato, cheese and onion pasties
ingredients: ['For the pastry', '500g strong plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt', '120g vegetable shortening (TrexÂ® or other)', '125g unsalted butter, softened to room temperature', '150ml cold water', 'For the filling', '1 large sweet potato, peeled and diced', '1 large brown onion, finely chopped', '200g extra mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '1 teaspoon English mustard powder', '2 teaspoons Cayenne pepper, to taste', 'ground black pepper to season, to taste', '1 egg, beaten, to glaze the pasties']
